title: Similar to ITC Officina Sans
content:
I need an exact match for this sans serif. ITC Officina Sans is very close. There are significant differences. The G is a different shape. The S in the sample has a slightly tapered stroke. The verticals on the A seem to curve ever so slightly, though this one could be due to a tracing...

Any help is greatly appreciated by my client and myself.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828232407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo-01_6004.JPG)
author: AcousticWonder

comments.content:
Take into account that tracing may introduce many misleading artifacts.  
I think **[Avenir Next Pro (Medium Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828232407/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Avenir%20Next%20LT%20Pro%20-%20Medium%20Condensed&fid=0352c73aaec044658cba6c7c25ace156&fsize=60&text=G.H.BASS&fit=1)** is closer than Officina Sans
Looks great! If this isn't close enough, nothing is. Thanks a bunch
